name: Teh Flix Geim Adventures
description:
[An april fools game by The Felix Game. This game will still be up for whoever wishes to play it while waiting for The Felix Game]

Help Felix find bones to feed to dogs and make them happy, thus making Felix happy!

To speed up the release of The Felix Game, the team has decided to completely rework the entire concept of How to be 행복해. All teasers released so far have been deleted in favor of adding dogs to the game. Because who doesn't love dogs?

Or, one member of the writing team who can barely draw and knows how to follow tutorials on YouTube decides to make a game.
